parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the resources. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to ALIYUN::WAF::DEFENSERESOURCE.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags to add to the resource.
